name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json sandbox/sandbox-outline-editor/.obsidian/plugins/outline-editor-plugin/manifest.json
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: mario
